name: Metal to the Petal
description:
A clicking game. Pick lupines, buy upgrades and aim to save the Swedish greenery from the invasive flower species Lupines!

Made during Game Jam +

We had 54 hours!

Software and assets used:

Softwares/Assets used, either free download or free trial available:

Music/Sound Design

Logic Pro X (free 90 day trial available)

Ableton 

REAPER

Audacity 

FMOD Studio 2.00.08

Adobe Audition Sound Effects Library - (https://offers.adobe.com/en/na/audition/offers/audition_dlc/AdobeAuditionDLCSFX.html, free to use for Creative Cloud members(trail available)) 

All plugins, synths and vst:s used are from the DAWs’ original libraries, available in the trials.

Programming and sharing

Unity 2020.1.8f1

SourceTree

BitBucket

Visual Studio

Graphics

Paint 3D

Clip Studio PAINT (free trial available)

Blender 2.8

Google Fonts (https://fonts.google.com/)

Photopea (https://www.photopea.com/ )
